messages.content: I'm blogger and i want to grow audience of my articles. I'm using wordpress, what can i do? I'm specialised in character design

Here are some tips for growing your audience as a character design blogger:

1. **Write high-quality content.** This is the most important thing you can do to attract readers and keep them coming back for more. Your content should be well-written, informative, and engaging.
2. **Promote your blog on social media.** Share your posts on social media platforms like Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram. Use relevant hashtags to help people find your content.
3. **Guest post on other blogs.** This is a great way to get exposure for your blog and to reach a new audience. When you guest post, be sure to write high-quality content that is relevant to the blog you are guest posting on.
4. **Comment on other blogs.** This is a great way to get involved in the blogging community and to start building relationships with other bloggers. When you comment on other blogs, be sure to add value to the discussion and to leave thoughtful comments.
5. **Run contests and giveaways.** This is a great way to attract new readers and to get people excited about your blog. When you run a contest or giveaway, be sure to promote it on social media and on your blog.
6. **Use SEO (search engine optimization) to improve your search engine ranking.** This will help people find your blog when they are searching for information about character design.
7. **Be consistent.** It takes time to build a following, so be patient and consistent with your blogging. Post new content regularly and make sure your content is high quality.
8. **Be yourself.** People can spot a fake from a mile away, so be yourself and let your personality shine through in your writing.
9. **Have fun!** Blogging should be enjoyable, so don't take it too seriously. If you're not having fun, your readers will be able to tell.

I hope these tips help you grow your audience as a character design blogger. Good luck!
I registered twitter and facebook for my site, but there's still no users. Where i can find free links for link building?

Here are some tips for finding free links for link building:

1. **Find relevant forums and discussion boards.** Look for forums and discussion boards that are related to your niche or industry. Participate in the discussions and leave valuable comments. Be sure to include a link back to your site in your signature.
2. **Comment on other blogs.** Find blogs that are relevant to your niche or industry and comment on their posts. Be sure to leave thoughtful comments that add value to the discussion. Include a link back to your site in your comment.
3. **Write guest posts for other blogs.** Find blogs that are related to your niche or industry and write guest posts for them. Be sure to write high-quality content that is relevant to the blog you are guest posting on. Include a link back to your site in your author bio.
4. **Submit your site to directories.** There are many directories that allow you to submit your website for free. Be sure to submit your site to directories that are relevant to your niche or industry.
5. **Create infographics.** Infographics are a great way to share your content and to get people to link to your site. Be sure to create high-quality infographics that are relevant to your niche or industry. Include a link back to your site in the infographic.
6. **Create videos.** Videos are a great way to share your content and to get people to link to your site. Be sure to create high-quality videos that are relevant to your niche or industry. Include a link back to your site in the video description.
7. **Create social media profiles.** Be sure to create social media profiles for your website on all of the major social media platforms. Share your content on social media and encourage people to link to your site.
8. **Reach out to other bloggers.** Reach out to other bloggers in your niche or industry and ask them to link to your site. Be sure to offer to link back to their sites as well.
9. **Attend industry events.** Attend industry events and meet other people in your niche or industry. Hand out business cards and encourage people to link to your site.
10. **Submit your site to search engines.** Be sure to submit your site to search engines so that people can find it.

I hope these tips help you find free links for link building.
